channel.title: WoW Private Server?
channel.description:
Well I was playing WoW for a few months got into it,didn't play too much but enough to raid anyhow recently hardly have time to play a lot so I ended my subscription but was looking for a private server that is almost the same as the actual game except maybe faster leveling or such...anyone got any ideas?
Thanks.

item.title: WoW Private Server?
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

sanga282:

make your own, theres tonnes of guides out there and its not that hard to set up the database and so on takes 5 minutes

I’m looking to play with other people besides myself,and I cannot host a server.

Thanks lord,might look into the 2nd link more,I found a decent server atm only problem they have VIP where you get amazing gear if you pay for it.

Just hoping to find higher rates than maybe 3x but it seems pretty cool.

Read full topic
